name: BowlerBall
description:
Explore different and challenging levels as you race to the end to try to knock down the pins for the ultimate score.

       This project was made with Unreal Engine 4. This project was never fully finished ; level one and five are not complete. The plan is to one day recreate it with Unity 3d.

This game was made for the computer science club at Bountiful High School in Bountiful, Utah. It was also submitted to the game development competition that was state wide.
